replies.body:
Throw keyboard in dishwasher

At least a quadra.
Go to your purchase history, use a refund.

Basically auto-attack in between your abilties (because her passive)

Build lots of AD to ramp up her BS shield

Learn how to jump walls with her third Q (run towards to wall then Q just before you hit it, its not like flash where you just dash in the chosen direction)

She has pretty crappy health regen too so some Life-steal might be nice (Ravenous Hydra synergies well with her passive while providing good life-steal)
where did you bring her from?...did she come willingly or put up a fight?
if you are up against garen/ darius/ fiora or renekton lane swap. other wise anything you do you should steamroll your opponent no matter how bad you are. (also AA between spells to maximise damage)
Learn to animation cancel and fast combo become a god. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dAjXN99Qg_Y
How can u miss 1 shot half map cone skillshot? xD

Leave an AA in between your QQQQ then you're off for a great start.

Ah and also, never miss your ulti, if you do then please uninstall.
